Description:

Buses will operate in two sections:
1. Between Downtown Brooklyn and Prospect Heights
The first and last stop in Downtown Brooklyn will be made on Sands St at Pearl St, and buses will detour via Tillary St/Park Ave. See downtown map
The first and last stop in Prospect Heights will be on Vanderbilt Ave at Atlantic Ave.

2. Between Kensington and Park Slope
In Park Slope, the last northbound stop will be on 7th Ave at Union St. Here is a map of the split detour.

Northbound missed stops:
7th Ave at Lincoln Pl and Sterling Pl
Flatbush Ave at Park Pl and 8th Ave
Vanderbilt Ave from Plaza St East to Pacific St
Flushing Ave from Vanderbilt Ave to N Elliot Pl
Sands St from Navy St to Jay St

Southbound missed stops:
Sands St at Gold St
Nassau St at Gold St
Flushing Ave from Navy St to Clermont Ave
Vanderbilt Ave from Fulton St to Plaza St East
Flatbush Ave at Plaza St E and Sterling Pl
Along 7th Ave from Flatbush Ave to 6th St

What's happening?
NYCRUNS Brooklyn Half Marathon

Note: Real-time tracking on BusTime may be inaccurate in the service change area

Summary: Southbound M1, M2, M3 and M4 stop on 5th Ave at E 104th St is closed
Description:
Southbound M1, M2, M3 and M4 stop on 5th Ave at E 104th St is closed
For service, consider the stops on 5th Ave at E 106th St or E 102nd St instead.

What's happening?

Description:

For westbound service, use the stops on Kings Highway at Avenue K or Ryder St.

Summary: Have you noticed that we're updating bus stop signs in Queens? We're preparing for the Queens Bus Network Redesign coming this summer
Description:
Have you noticed that we're updating bus stop signs in Queens? We're preparing for the Queens Bus Network Redesign coming this summer
Queens Bus Network Redesign service improvements will be phased in by route on June 29 and August 31, 2025.

Until then, know that your bus route will still serve current stops, but some signs will reflect future service.

Use the MTA app or BusTime to plan your trip.

Learn more about the project at mta.info/queensbus

Summary: Southbound B43 buses will detour at Brooklyn Ave and St Johns Pl and make the last stop on Washington Ave between Empire Blvd and Lefferts Ave
Description:
Southbound B43 buses will detour at Brooklyn Ave and St Johns Pl and make the last stop on Washington Ave between Empire Blvd and Lefferts Ave
The last southbound stop before the detour will be made on Brooklyn Ave at Park Pl
Southbound buses make requested stops along Albany Ave, then make regular stops along Empire Blvd from Brooklyn Ave to Washington Ave at Empire Blvd and Lefferts Ave, last stop.

The first northbound stop will also be made on Washington Ave at Empire Blvd. then buses will operate via Lefferts Blvd and Bedford Ave and regular along Empire Blvd.
Here is a map of the detoured route.

Northbound missed stops:
Lincoln Rd at Ocean Ave
Empire Blvd at Washington Ave

Southbound missed stops:
Along Brooklyn Ave from St Johns Pl to Montgomery St
Lincoln Rd at Flatbush Ave

What's happening?
NYCRUNS Brooklyn Half Marathon
